law.catch_line: The Administration shall examine and determine the genuineness, regularity, and legality of each app...

text.section: The Administration shall examine and determine the genuineness, regularity, and legality of each application made to it under the Maryland Vehicle Law.

The Administration shall reject an application:
If it is not satisfied as to the genuineness, regularity, or legality of the application or the truth of any statement it contains; or
For any other reason authorized by law.
